name: Tiles Hop EDM Rush Music Game

ios.subtitle: Ball and piano tile music game

editorialNotes.tagline: Play along with your fave hits
editorialNotes.standard: Beatstar can make your device feel like an instrument to play your favorite songs: Earn rewards by tightly coordinating tile-tapping with the music's flow. Few music games deliver such a rush in pursuit of nailing the perfect score. With a track list featuring artists from Lil Nas X to Lynyrd Skynyrd, Beatstar lets you play the hits and discover fantastic new music too.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Whether your groove is ’60s rock, Taylor Swift, or anything in between, this expertly crafted music-trivia game has all the tunes you’ll want to name. With clips from more than 10,000 songs, it’s easy to get hooked on its multiple-choice competitions, and the excellent new Party mode tests your skills against the masses in daily tournaments. Thankfully, if you played the first SongPop, your progress, coins, and so on carry over into this impressive sequel.

editorialNotes.standard: Spotting the minute differences in every beautiful scene of this relaxing 3D puzzler takes a keen eye.

editorialNotes.tagline: Tap and swipe to country music
editorialNotes.standard: Beatstar’s gone country, y’all! Tap in time to the genre’s catchiest tracks in this down-home spin on the hit rhythm game.

ios.subtitle: Grow plants in a cozy cottage

editorialNotes.standard: No green thumb? No problem! Nurture a windowsill garden in this relaxing idle game by catching raindrops and sunshine.

An irresistible game of discovery, the prequel to My Singing Monsters lets you form a different group of merry musicians—the ancestors of those in the first game. As you breed new furry friends and add them to your orchestra, you can see how their unique melodies affect the overall sound. Meanwhile, caring for your crew by gathering resources and crafting unique items provides a satisfying challenge.
